actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the amount of certain cancellations of indebtedness under health care education loan programs.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income, under the Internal Revenue Code, the amount of specified cancellations of indebtedness under health care education loan programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the amount of certain cancellations of indebtedness under health care education loan programs.
